NAME: Delivery Note Created by Despatcher
DESCRIPTION: Delivery note created by the dispatcher on behalf of the seller

NAME: Delivery Note Created by Seller
DESCRIPTION: Delivery note created directly by the seller

NAME: Delivery Note Handed to Driver
DESCRIPTION: Delivery note given to the driver for transport

NAME: Receipt Confirmation by Driver
DESCRIPTION: Confirmation that the driver has taken over the goods

NAME: Receipt Confirmation by Receiver (Digital)
DESCRIPTION: Electronic confirmation of goods receipt by the receiver

NAME: Receipt Confirmation by Driver (Paper)
DESCRIPTION: Paper-based confirmation of goods takeover by the driver
